pr_title: HDDS-3196 New PipelineManager interface to persist to RatisServer.

timeline.message: HDDS-3196 New PipelineManager interface to persist to RatisServer.
HDDS-3196 New PipelineManager interface to persist to RatisServer.

timeline.bodyText: NIT: we can just pass RatisServer instead of SCMHAManager here.
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

replies.bodyText: We may have more stuff in SCMHAManager than just SCMRatisServer for PipelineManager use cases. The idea here is to have a manager interface for SCM HA so that we won't worry about passing more things into PipelineManager like configs or other things. @xiaoyuyao
replies.author: timmylicheng

replies.bodyText: In the future, we have to do isLeader check inside PipelineManager for which we might need SCMHAManager instance.
replies.author: nandakumar131

timeline.bodyText: NIT: can we group all the method with @replicate annotation together either at the begining or end with some java doc?
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

timeline.bodyText: We should not expose TableIterator from PipelineStateManager
timeline.author: nandakumar131

timeline.bodyText:
stateManager#addPipeline is replicated via Ratis, which will make the pipeline added to in-memory and to DB on all the SCMs.
nodeManager#addPipeline, since executed outside of PipelineStateManager will only be executed on Leader SCM. This will be a problem as the followers will not have this information.
Move nodeManager#addPipeline call to stateManager#addPipeline.
timeline.author: nandakumar131

timeline.bodyText: We don't need a initialize method exposed, this can. be done called inside PipelineStateManagerImpl constructor.
timeline.author: nandakumar131
